folderDropzone.placeholder: Drop a directory or an Archifiltre JSON here
folderDropzone.placeholderSubtitle: No modification on the original directory
folderDropzone.zipNotificationMessage: Archifiltre doesn't handle zips, please unzip them to read them
folderDropzone.disclaimerSubtitle: Your data won't leave your computer. Only you can see what happens in this app.
folderDropzone.loadingErrorMessage: You probably neither dropped a folder nor a file.
folderDropzone.wrongJsonVersion: The file you dropped wasn't produced with the same version of Archifiltre
folderDropzone.errorsWhileLoading: An error occurred while loading. Click to check the error log.
folderDropzone.rootElementError: Archifiltre cannot currently read a drive or a root folder. Please drop a child folder instead.
folderDropzone.slug: Visualise and improve your file trees !
folderDropzone.multipleFoldersDroppedErrorMessage: Archifiltre cannot read several folders at the same time
folderDropzone.unexpectedErrorMessage: An unexpected error occurred. Click here to copy the error details.

report.yourCommentsHere: Select an item to add a comment
report.fileHashExplanation: This hash is a file digital fingerprint computed with the MD5 algorithm
report.folderHashExplanation: This hash is a digital fingerprint (computed with the MD5 algorithm) of this folder's children hashes concatenation
report.boundaryDatesExplanation: Dates of the oldest and newest elements in this file tree
report.medianExplanation: This is the date at which half of this folder's files have been "closed". There are as many elements modified before than after this date
report.noElementSelected: Select an item to see its characteristics
report.openElementErrorMessage: Archifiltre could not open the chosen element
report.hashIconExplanation: This icon is a graphical representation of this element's hash

workspace.yourTagsHere: Select an item to add tags
workspace.cannotMoveToChild: Cannot move an element to one of its children
workspace.cannotMoveToFile: Cannot move an element to a file
workspace.nameConflict: Name conflict with one of this folder elements
workspace.noOptions: No results - Press enter to add a new tag

header.csvWithHashDisabledMessage: You must wait for hashes to have been computed

hash.loadingErrorMessage: An error occurred while loading hashes. Click here for more details.
hash.title: Hash

export.metsExportErrorFileDoesNotExist: File "{{filePath}}" cannot be found. It may have been moved or deleted.
export.metsExportErrorCannotAccessFile: Cannot access file "{{filePath}}". You may have lost access to the file.
export.exportSuccessMessage: The METS zip has been created in the projet parent folder
export.resipExportSuccessMessage: The metadata file has been exported to project root folder
export.creatingCsvExportWithHashes: Creating the CSV with hashes export file
export.deletionScriptSuccessMessage: Deletion script has been generated. Click here to access it.
export.auditReportStarted: The audit report export has started
export.auditReportSuccess: The audit report export has succeeded

replay.title: Restore previous session
replay.error: An error occurred while restoring the previous session.

errorDescriptions.EBUSY: The resource is busy. Maybe it's currently used by another process.
errorDescriptions.EACCES: You do not have the rights to access this file.

settingsModal.title: Settings
settingsModal.monitoringData: Technical usage data (helps us fixing bugs)
settingsModal.reloadExplanation: You need to reload the app to apply new settings

audit.reportReadyMessage: The full audit report is ready.
